title: Housing minister condemns Karachi Bolton Marketâ€™s blast
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 17 (APP):Federal Minister for Housing and Works Maulana Abdul Wasay on Tuesday condemned the blast near Bolton Market, Muhammad Ali Jinnah Road, Karachi.
He, in a condolence message, grieved over the loss of precious lives in the blast.
Abdul Wasay expressed sympathies to the family of the woman killed in the blast and prayed for speedy recovery of the injured.
